text: Shaun Russell Ellis-Bradley (born April 8, 1997) is an American football linebacker for the Philadelphia Eagles of the National Football League (NFL). He played college football at Temple and was drafted by the Eagles in the sixth round of the 2020 NFL Draft. ==College career== While mulling offers from Delaware, Rhode Island and others, Bradley committed to Temple too late to be on scholarship, leading him to grayshirt the 2015 season, attending classes at Rowan College at Burlington County before being a part of Temple's 2016 signing class. ==Professional career== Bradley was drafted by the Philadelphia Eagles in the sixth round with the 196th overall pick of the 2020 NFL Draft. ==References== Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:People from Westampton Township, New Jersey Category:Rancocas Valley Regional High School alumni Category:Sportspeople from Burlington County, New Jersey Category:American football linebackers Category:Temple Owls football players Category:Philadelphia Eagles players
title: Shaun Bradley
